Effect.en: Excavate cards from the top of your Deck, equal to the number of "Beaming Prosperity" in your GY +3, and if you do, if there are 3 card types (Monster, Spell, and Trap) among them, add 1 of them to your hand, also send the remaining cards to the GY. Otherwise, shuffle all excavated cards into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Beaming Prosperity" per turn.
